text: Vagra assembly constituency (જંબુસર વિધાનસભા બેઠક) is one of the 182 assembly constituencies of Gujarat state, western India. It is located in Bharuch district. == List of segments == This assembly seat represents the following segments, # Vagra Taluka # Bharuch Taluka (Part) : Villages – Adol, Aldar, Amdada, == Total number of voters == http://ceo.gujarat.gov.in/download/PCAC.pdf {| class="wikitable" |- ! Election !! Polling Stations !! Male Voters !! Female Voters !! Others !! Total Voters |- | 2014 || 222 || 94190 || 87296 || 2 || 181488 |} == Member of Legislative Assembly == *2007 - Iqbal Patel, Indian National Congress *2012 - Arunsinh Rana, Bharatiya Janata Party *2017 - Arunsinh Rana, Bharatiya Janta Party == Election results == ===2012=== http://ceo.gujarat.gov.in/download/Detail_Report_AC2012.pdf == References == == See also == List of constituencies of Gujarat Legislative Assembly Gujarat Legislative Assembly Category:Assembly constituencies of Gujarat Category:Bharuch district
title: Vagra
